sentence.Network_cn: 她保留了许多副本以便作进一步的注解。

entry.def: To retain something means to continue to have that thing.

example.ex: The interior of the shop still retains a nineteenth-century atmosphere...
example.tran: 这家商店的内部装修仍然保留着19世纪的风格。

example.ex: He retains a deep respect for the profession...
example.tran: 他对这个职业仍然深怀敬意。

entry.def: If you retain a lawyer, you pay him or her a fee to make sure that he or she will represent you when your case comes before the court.

example.ex: He decided to retain him for the trial.
example.tran: 他决定聘请他为出庭律师。

means.word_mean: 1. continued in your keeping or use or memory;

sentences.sentence: "in...the retained pattern of dancers and guests remembered"
